Package runner

Class CoverageMap

java.lang.Object
runner.CoverageMap
public class CoverageMap
extends java.lang.Object
A CoverageMap is used to generate a map-like image representation from a List of GeographicGridPolygon. Every pixel of the generated image corresponds to a single geographic location for which a polygon is provided.

The image always has the same resolution, based on the size of the grid weather dataset. Positions for which no data is given will result in transparent pixels. Therefore this can be used to test filters provided to the WeatherGridDataPolygonsFactory.

This is also useful to visualize the effect of different WeatherPolygonPainters.

Author:
Anton Ballmaier

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int HEIGHT
    The height of resulting images.
    private java.awt.image.BufferedImage img
    The image buffer on which the coverage map is drawn.
    private WeatherPolygonPainter painter
    The painter providing the colors of the resulting image
    private java.util.List<GeographicGridPolygon> polygons
    The List of used GeographicGridPolygon instances to draw to the map.
    private static int WIDTH
    The width of resulting images.

    Constructor Description
    CoverageMap​(java.util.List<GeographicGridPolygon> polygons, WeatherPolygonPainter painter)
    Constructs a new CoverageMap object using the given polygons and the WeatherPolygonPainter for providing them colors.

  • Field Details

    • HEIGHT

      private static int HEIGHT
      The height of resulting images. This is dependent on the number of longitude steps in the original dataset.

    • WIDTH

      private static int WIDTH
      The width of resulting images. This is dependent on the number of latitude steps in the original dataset.

    • img

      private final java.awt.image.BufferedImage img
      The image buffer on which the coverage map is drawn.

    • painter

      private final WeatherPolygonPainter painter
      The painter providing the colors of the resulting image

    • polygons

      private final java.util.List<GeographicGridPolygon> polygons
      The List of used GeographicGridPolygon instances to draw to the map.

  • Constructor Details

    • CoverageMap

      public CoverageMap​(java.util.List<GeographicGridPolygon> polygons, WeatherPolygonPainter painter)
      Constructs a new CoverageMap object using the given polygons and the WeatherPolygonPainter for providing them colors.
      Parameters:
      polygons - the GeographicGridPolygon instances to draw
      painter - the painter providing colors for the given polygons.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.lang.String imgPath)
      Draws and saves the coverage map as an image to the given directory. No file ending must be provided.
      Parameters:
      imgPath - the path and file name where to save the image.

    • saveImg

      private void saveImg​(java.lang.String imgPath)
      Saves the content of the image buffer as an image to the given directory. No file ending must be provided.
      Parameters:
      imgPath - the path and file name where to save the image

    • setPixel

      private void setPixel​(int x, int y, int[] rgb)
      Sets a specific pixel of the image buffer to the given color.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the pixel
      y - the y coordinate of the pixel
      rgb - the color to set the pixel to
